properties.name: camel.component.zookeeper-master.autowired-enabled
properties.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

properties.name: camel.component.zookeeper-master.bridge-error-handler
properties.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler, which mean any exceptions occurred while the consumer is trying to pickup incoming messages, or the likes, will now be processed as a message and handled by the routing Error Handler. By default the consumer will use the org.apache.camel.spi.ExceptionHandler to deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

properties.name: camel.component.zookeeper-master.container-id-factory
properties.description: To use a custom ContainerIdFactory for creating container ids. The option is a org.apache.camel.component.zookeepermaster.ContainerIdFactory type.

properties.name: camel.component.zookeeper-master.curator
properties.description: To use a custom configured CuratorFramework as connection to zookeeper ensemble. The option is a org.apache.curator.framework.CuratorFramework type.

properties.name: camel.component.zookeeper-master.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the zookeeper-master component. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.component.zookeeper-master.maximum-connection-timeout
properties.description: Timeout in millis to use when connecting to the zookeeper ensemble

properties.name: camel.component.zookeeper-master.zk-root
properties.description: The root path to use in zookeeper where information is stored which nodes are master/slave etc. Will by default use: /camel/zookeepermaster/clusters/master

properties.name: camel.component.zookeeper-master.zoo-keeper-password
properties.description: The password to use when connecting to the zookeeper ensemble

properties.name: camel.component.zookeeper-master.zoo-keeper-url
properties.description: The url for the zookeeper ensemble
